title: Software Engineer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Market Disc Media provides comprehensive B2B marketing and sales acceleration services to businesses and agencies globally. Specializing in building scalable strategies, we help companies convert potential customer intent into predictable pipelines. Powered by our innovative AI\\-driven TAM Intelligence Engine and proprietary Ready\\-to\\-Switch Index (RSI), we identify high\\-conversion accounts ready for outreach. Our solutions focus on consent\\-first data, precise multi\\-channel engagement, and in\\-depth buyer need discovery for maximizing outcomes. Market Disc Media is committed to driving measurable growth and success for our clients.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time on\\-site role for a Software Engineer located in Pune. The Software Engineer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining back\\-end web applications. They will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to gather and analyze requirements, write efficient and scalable code, and ensure the software meets performance standards. Additionally, the Software Engineer will participate in code reviews, debug and troubleshoot issues, and stay updated with emerging technologies.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Strong knowledge in Computer Science and Software Development
* Experience in Back\\-End Web Development and Programming
* Proficiency in Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP)
* Experience in Python programming
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and ability to work in a team environment
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
* Experience with version control systems like Git is a plus
* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies is beneficial

title: Software Engineer
description:
Job Purpose and Impact
   

  

 The Professional, Software Engineering job maintains and partners to design and develop software applications and systems. With limited supervision, this job collaborates with cross functional teams to implement new software features to meet user needs and business goals and upgrade existing software to improve performance and functionality through writing clean, efficient and scalable code and troubleshooting and debugging moderately complex issues. This job also participates in code reviews to maintain high code quality and share knowledge with software engineering team members. This position allows the individual to deliver a global software solution in the agriculture industry and make a real impact to our customers and their animals around the world.
   

  

 Key Accountabilities
   

  

* SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT: Partners to design and develop high quality software solutions by writing clean, maintainable and efficient codes.
* AUTOMATION: Applies internal software deployment platform, methodologies and tools to automate the deployment process, ensuring smooth and reliable releases.
* COLLABORATION: Partners with cross functional team of product managers, designers and other engineers to gather moderately complex requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs.
* TESTING \\& DEBUGGING: Writes and maintains moderately complex unit tests and integration tests, and performs debugging to maintain the quality and performance of the software.
* CONTINUOUS IMPROVEMENT: Makes suggestions for improving the software development and deployment processes, and implements the approved standards to improve efficiency and reliability.
* DOCUMENTATION: Drafts and maintains comprehensive documentation for moderately complex software applications, deployment processes and system configurations.
* TECHNICAL SUPPORT: Provides technical support and troubleshooting for moderately complex issues with deployed applications to ensure minimal downtime and fast resolution.


**Qualifications**
* Some experience in React, including hooks, context API, and state management libraries (Redux, Zustand)
* Solid experience with JavaScript (ES6\\+), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3\\.
* Strong experience with‚ÄØC\\#‚ÄØand‚ÄØ.NET Framework/.NET Core.
* Solid understanding of‚ÄØobject\\-oriented programming.
* Experience with‚ÄØunit testing‚ÄØand‚ÄØmocking frameworks‚ÄØ(e.g., xUnit, NUnit, Moq).
* Familiarity with‚ÄØdesign patterns‚ÄØ(e.g., Repository, Factory, Strategy).
* Experience with‚ÄØSQL DBs, MySQL, Postgres, or MS SQL: writing queries, stored procedures, and performance tuning.
* Knowledge of RESTful APIs and message\\-based systems.
* Experience with‚ÄØrelational databases‚ÄØand data access libraries (e.g., Entity Framework, Dapper).
* Knowledge of ReactJS
* Proficient in‚ÄØGit: branching, merging, pull requests, and version control workflows.
* Fluent English level
* Please attach your CV in English when applying for the position.


 Preferred:
   

  

* Experience with Azure.
* Experience with‚ÄØCI/CD pipelines‚ÄØ(Azure DevOps).
* Familiarity with‚ÄØlogging and monitoring tools‚ÄØ(e.g., Serilog, Application Insights).
* Understanding of‚ÄØasynchronous programming‚ÄØin .‚ÄØ.NET.

title: React JS
description:
**Company Description**

 PPStack is a global EdTech brand revolutionizing the future of education by bridging the gap between education and industry. By leveraging artificial intelligence, innovative teaching methods, and technology, PPStack equips students, professionals, and organizations with future\\-ready skills, enabling career transformations and digital empowerment. Trusted by learners worldwide, the company offers AI\\-powered learning solutions, career coaching, corporate training, digital branding, and technology consulting. PPStack is committed to fostering innovation through education and creating impactful learning ecosystems that drive professional growth and digital transformation.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote role for a React JS Developer. The individual in this position will design, develop, and maintain high\\-performance front\\-end applications using React JS. Responsibilities include collaborating with design and backend teams, implementing responsive UI components, optimizing application performance, and maintaining clean, reusable codebases. The role requires constant learning of new technologies and frameworks to ensure cutting\\-edge solutions for business requirements.

title: Software Technologist I
description:
Job Title
   

  

 Software Technologist I
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are seeking a
 **Embedded Software Developer** 
 to join our high\\-performing team and contribute to key projects in the
 **Hospital Patient Monitoring** 
 domain. The ideal candidate will have
 **expertise in Linux OSS, BSP, Yocto, C\\+\\+ development, system architecture, and software quality assurance** 
 . You will be responsible for
 **designing, optimizing, and delivering scalable solutions** 
 while mentoring junior developers and driving innovation.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Analyze and understand software/functional requirements to design and develop high\\-quality software.
* Write efficient, maintainable code following best practices and conduct code reviews.
* Developing Bare Metal and/or Linux drivers for Embedded devices based on iMX processors.
* Developing or customizing board support packages (BSP).
* Implement developer\\-level testing (unit, component) to ensure software reliability.
* Writing component tests using Google Test (GTest) with Gherkin syntax following behavior\\-driven development (BDD) principles.
* Create technical documentation and comply with development policies.
* Debug, troubleshoot, and resolve complex software issues efficiently.
* Stay updated with technical advancements and advocate best practices within the team.


**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**
* 5\\-8 years of relevant experience as a developer working in a Linux development environment
* At least 3\\+ years of experience in developing Custom Embedded Linux Operating Systems using Yocto, BitBake recipes and OpenEmbedded.
* Experience in embedded development, Linux device driver development, integration, board bring\\-up activities such as programming, debugging, troubleshooting and functionality testing
* Advanced knowledge of C, C\\+\\+, shell scripts, Python and proven hands\\-on experience
* Good understanding in electronics hardware: schematics, data sheets reading is added advantage
* Solid knowledge of Embedded Linux systems, low\\-level software (drivers, BSP), open\\-source, Yocto, and proven hands\\-on experience


**How We Work Together**
 We believe that we are better together than apart. For our office\\-based teams, this means working in\\-person at least 3 days per week.
   

  

 Onsite roles require full\\-time presence in the company‚Äôs facilities.
   

  

 Field roles are most effectively done outside of the company‚Äôs main facilities, generally at the customers‚Äô or suppliers‚Äô locations.
   

  

 Indicate if this role is an office/field/onsite role.
   

  

**About Philips**
 We are a health technology company. We built our entire company around the belief that every human matters, and we won't stop until everybody everywhere has access to the quality healthcare that we all deserve. Do the work of your life to help the lives of others.
   

  

* Learn more about our business.
* Discover our rich and exciting history.
* Learn more about our purpose.


 If you‚Äôre interested in this role and have many, but not all, of the experiences needed, we encourage you to apply. You may still be the right candidate for this or other opportunities at Philips. Learn more about our culture of impact with care here.

title: Embedded Firmware Engineer
description:
**Key Responsibilities**
* Firmware Development
* Design, implement, and maintain firmware for microcontroller\\-based systems (STM32, ESP, etc.) in C/C\\+\\+.
* Develop and optimize communication protocols (RS485, Modbus RTU, UART, SPI, I¬≤C).
* Work with sensors, relays, dimmers, and control circuits for real\\-time applications.
* Implement RTOS\\-based designs and event\\-driven state machines.
* System Integration
* Collaborate with hardware, app, and testing teams for full product integration.
* Support PCB bring\\-up, prototype validation, and debugging using JTAG/SWD tools.
* Contribute to production firmware and field\\-upgradeable systems (bootloader/OTA).
* Testing \\& Documentation
* Conduct firmware validation, fault analysis, and performance tuning.
* Maintain version control, change logs, and technical documentation.
* Support QA and production teams in pre\\-release verification.


**Required Skills**
* 4√¢6 years of experience in embedded firmware development.
* Proficiency in Embedded C / C\\+\\+, RTOS, and microcontroller peripherals.
* Strong understanding of RS485 / Modbus communication, I/O handling, and timing control.
* Experience using debugging tools (oscilloscopes, logic analyzers, etc.).
* Familiarity with Git and structured firmware release processes.

title: Principal Software Engineer
description:
**Overview**
 Have you ever imagined a world with an infinite amount of storage available and accessible to everyone? A place where anyone can easily access books, music, photos, videos, and any data from anywhere at any time through mobile phones, tablets, personal computers, and smart devices. Have you ever wanted a universally accessible storage system to record all knowledge, preserve creative works, and store scientific data for global collaboration? Do you want to be part of a team that strives to make this vision a reality?
   

  

 If so, the Microsoft Azure Storage team is what you are looking for. We are building Microsoft‚Äôs cloud storage solution‚ÄîAzure Storage‚Äîa massively scalable, highly distributed, and globally accessible system designed to serve the entire world. We continue to experience tremendous growth, storing many exabytes of data, and are designing systems for zettabyte scale to support demand growth for the coming years.
   

  

 We are looking for a Principal Software Engineer who is passionate about distributed storage, specifically focused on building a common platform for the Control Plane in Azure Storage. This platform powers Azure Storage services and provides resiliency and scalability. You will work on challenges related to scale and reliability for distributed systems, collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design storage solutions that meet performance, availability, and durability goals, and grow your career alongside a world\\-class team of engineers and architects.
   

  

 Microsoft‚Äôs mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Own and show strong technical and non\\-technical leadership in driving the product (End\\-to\\-End) E2E.
* Create a team culture of quality first mentality that directly contributes to delivering high quality features and changes as part of the stack.
* Research and deep dive into technical issues and design challenges.
* Collaborate cross organization to deliver key features in Azure storage.
* Contribute to the overall technical direction of Azure storage alongside other leads and managers across geo locations.
* Acts as a Designated Responsible Individual (DRI) and guides other engineers by developing and following the playbook, working on call to monitor system/product/service for degradation, downtime, or interruptions, alerting stakeholders about status and initiates actions to restore system/product/service for simple and complex problems when appropriate


**Qualifications**
**Required Qualifications:**
* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related technical field AND 12\\+ years technical engineering experience with coding in languages including, but not limited to, C, C\\+\\+, C\\#, Java, JavaScript, or Python
+ OR equivalent experience.

* 1\\+ year(s) experience building quality products and services in distributed systems, systems programming, and multi\\-threaded programming.
+ Includes demonstrated ability to ship products on time with high quality.

* 1\\+ year(s) experience in design and problem\\-solving with a focus on engineering excellence at scale
+ Strong skills in delivering reliable solutions and maintaining quality standards.


**Other Qualifications**
* Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role. These requirements include, but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings:
+ Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud Background Check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
+ OR related technical field AND 12\\+ years technical engineering experience with coding in languages including, but not limited to, C, C\\+\\+, C\\#, Java, JavaScript, OR Python OR Master's Degree in Computer Science or related technical field AND 8\\+ years technical engineering experience with coding in languages including, but not limited to, C, C\\+\\+, C\\#, Java, JavaScript, or Python OR equivalent experience.

* 1\\+ year(s) experience in hands\\-on development, including leading architecture for large\\-scale systems such as storage and cloud computing
+ Skilled in designing and writing code with proven coding experience.

* 1\\+ year(s) experience demonstrating customer empathy when building and delivering products
+ Ability to understand user needs and incorporate feedback into solutions.


 This position will be open for a minimum of 5 days, with applications accepted on an ongoing basis until the position is filled.
   

  

 Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance with religious accommodations and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about
 **requesting accommodations.**

title: Python
description:
**Company Description**

 PPStack is a global leader in EdTech, focused on empowering students, professionals, and organizations with essential skills and tools to thrive in the digital age. By integrating artificial intelligence, innovative teaching methods, and advanced technology, we create impactful learning experiences for our users worldwide. Our mission is to bridge the gap between education and industry by offering future\\-ready solutions that drive career transformation and digital growth. With services including AI\\-powered learning platforms, career coaching, digital branding, corporate training, and curriculum design, PPStack is shaping an ecosystem where education fuels creativity and innovation. Trusted globally, we are dedicated to fostering student employability, facilitating academic\\-industry collaboration, and delivering cutting\\-edge technology solutions.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site Python Developer role located at our headquarters in Noida. The Python Developer will be responsible for building, optimizing, and maintaining scalable solutions for various projects and platforms. This includes developing clean, efficient, and reusable code, ensuring data security, troubleshooting and debugging to optimize performance, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to design innovative systems. The role also involves integrating third\\-party APIs, conducting code reviews, and staying updated with the latest advancements in Python and related technologies.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Python programming and frameworks such as Django and Flask
* Experience with data structures, algorithms, and object\\-oriented programming
* Knowledge of database systems such as SQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB
* Experience with RESTful API development and integration
* Understanding of debugging, testing, and deploying scalable applications
* Ability to work in a collaborative environment, communicate effectively, and meet project deadlines
* Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is a plus
* A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field is preferred
* Prior experience in EdTech platforms or technology\\-driven learning solutions is a strong advantage

title: QA Engineering Professional
description:
**Why BT**
 We‚Äôve always been an organisation with a purpose; to use the power of communication to make a better world. You can trace this back to our beginning as pioneers of the world‚Äôs firs telecommunications company. At our heart we‚Äôre a technology company with research and innovation in our bones and a desire to be personal, simple, and brilliant for our customers \\- those are the values we live by whilst also creating an inclusive working environment where people from all backgrounds can succeed.Our pursuit of progress over the past 180 years has established BT as a strong, successful brand, with huge scale capable of achieving great things. From supporting emergency services, hospitals, banks and keeping economies around the world online, safe and secure, to delivering large scale technology infrastructure like the creation of BT Sport.
   

  

 Today in this fast\\-changing, always on, digital world our purpose remains true. Yet the market conditions, regulations and competition we face are tougher than ever before. So, if you have the drive, optimism and resilience to help propel us forward we‚Äôll offer unrivalled personal development, a wealth of opportunities to learn, experience new things and pursue new careers. If that‚Äôs you and what you‚Äôre looking for, we‚Äôd love you to be part of our future.
   

  

**Why this job matters**
 This is a fantastic opportunity to be involved in the development, testing and delivery of applications that assist our next generation Broadband CPE, including Broadband Smart Hubs, Complete Wi\\-Fi and Hybrid Connect (4G) modems.
   

  

 You will need to work effectively as part of UK based agile squads, owns the testing of cutting edge client applications and embedded devices, working alongside highly skilled software and partnering developers and testers, within the Broadband Devices tribe.
   

  

 The next generation converged products and services we develop are at the heart of our customers‚Äô Broadband experience in their homes and businesses ‚Äì your skills and values will help shape our products for millions of customers across the UK.
   

  

**What You‚Äôll Be Doing**
 Develop automation test scripts for our next generation converged products and services
   

  

 Deliver resolutions to problems that tend to be complex, cross\\-domain or of high impact to customers.
   

  

 Provide technical quality assurance over work of other engineers through matrix team structure
   

  

 Working effectively as part of Agile delivery squads
   

  

 Using scrum/JIRA/Wiki for tracking agile workflow deliveries
   

  

 Supporting proactive improvement initiatives
   

  

**The Skills You‚Äôll Need To Succeed**
* Extensive knowledge of Robot Framework
* Knowledge of python
* Knowledge of VMs and Containerisation
* Knowledge of Linux and Docker
* Using code revision, issue tracking and continuous integration tools, i.e. git, JIRA, Gitlab
* Good knowledge of Agile delivery methods and tools, e.g. scrum/JIRA/wiki
* Good knowledge of Broadband/Home Gateway standards, e.g. xDSL, FTTP, IPv4/IPv6, PPP, Wi\\-Fi, UPnP, 4G/5G mobile networks
* Ability to clearly communicate complex technical material
* Ability to self\\-develop in required areas


**Experience You‚Äôd Be Expected To Have**
* At least 4 years of professional software testing experience.
* Strong experience in automated testing, specifically using Robot Framework.
* Experience writing code using Python, Selenium
* Experience of interacting with senior stakeholders from across the business
* Industry leading class hands on skills and knowledge on Mobile app manual and automated testing with recent experience in Perfecto.
* Prior experience of leading a quality assurance team with evidence of introducing automated test suites.


**Our leadership standards**
**Looking in:**
**Leading inclusively and Safely**
 I inspire and build trust through self\\-awareness, honesty and integrity.
   

  

**Owning outcomes**
 I take the right decisions that benefit the broader organisation.
   

  

**Looking out:**
**Delivering for the customer**
 I execute brilliantly on clear priorities that add value to our customers and the wider business.
   

  

**Commercially savvy**
 I demonstrate strong commercial focus, bringing an external perspective to decision\\-making.
   

  

**Looking to the future:**
**Growth mindset**
 I experiment and identify opportunities for growth for both myself and the organisation.
   

  

**Building for the future**
 I build diverse future\\-ready teams where all individuals can be at their best.
   

  

**About Us**
 BT is part of BT Group, along with EE, Openreach, and Plusnet.
   

  

 Millions of people rely on us every day to help them live their lives, power their businesses, and keep their public services running. We connect friends to family, clients to colleagues, people to possibilities. We keep the wheels of business spinning, and the emergency services responding.
   

  

 We value diversity and celebrate difference. ‚ÄòWe embed diversity and inclusion into everything that we do. It‚Äôs fundamental to our purpose: we connect for good.‚Äô
   

  

 We all stick to the same values: Personal, Simple, and Brilliant. From day one, you‚Äôll get stuck in to tough challenges, pitch in with ideas, make things happen. But you won‚Äôt be alone: we‚Äôll be there with help and support, learning and development.
   

  

 This is your chance to make a real difference to the world: to be part of the digital transformation of countless lives and businesses. Grab it.
   

  

**A FEW POINTS TO NOTE:**
 Although these roles are listed as full\\-time, if you‚Äôre a job share partnership, work reduced hours, or any other way of working flexibly, please still get in touch.
   

  

 We will also offer reasonable adjustments for the selection process if required, so please do not hesitate to inform us.
   

  

**DON'T MEET EVERY SINGLE REQUIREMENT?**
 Studies have shown that women and people who are disabled, LGBTQ\\+, neurodiverse or from ethnic minority backgrounds are less likely to apply for jobs unless they meet every single qualification and criteria. We're committed to building a diverse, inclusive, and authentic workplace where everyone can be their best, so if you're excited about this role but your past experience doesn't align perfectly with every requirement on the Job Description, please apply anyway \\- you may just be the right candidate for this or other roles in our wider team.

	+ Ensuring the test cases are peer reviewed and achieving less rework
	+ Work with development team to identify and capture test cases, ensure version
	+ Setting the criteria, parameters, scope/out\\-scope of testing and involve in UAT (User Acceptance Testing)
	+ Automate the test life cycle process at the appropriate stages through vb macros, scheduling, GUI automation etc
* **To design and execute the automation framework and reporting** 
	+ Develop and automate tests for software validation by setting up of test environments, designing test plans, developing test cases/scenarios/usage cases, and executing these cases
	+ Ensure the test defects raised are as per the norm defined for project / program / account with clear description and replication patterns
	+ Detect bug issues and prepare file defect reports and report test progress
	+ No instances of rejection / slippage of delivered work items and they are within the Wipro / Customer ¬†SLA's and norms
	+ Design and timely release of test status dashboard at the end of every cycle test execution to the stake holders
	+ Providing feedback on usability and serviceability, trace the result to quality risk and report it to concerned stakeholders


 Õè
 * **Status Reporting and Customer Focus on an ongoing basis with respect to testing and its execution** 
	+ Ensure good quality of interaction with customer w.r.t. e\\-mail content, fault report tracking, voice calls, business etiquette etc
	+ On time deliveries \\- WSRs, Test execution report and relevant dashboard updates in Test management repository
	+ Updates of accurate efforts in eCube, TMS and other project related trackers
	+ Timely Response to customer requests and no instances of complaints either internally or externally


 Õè NoPerformance ParameterMeasure1Understanding the test requirements and test case design of the productEnsure error free testing solutions, minimum process exceptions, 100% SLA compliance, \\# of automation done using VB, macros2Execute test cases and reportingTesting efficiency \\& quality, On\\-Time Delivery, Troubleshoot queries within TAT, CSAT score

 .

description:
**Company Description**
  

 Doori, based in Mumbai, Maharashtra, is a leading technology company dedicated to revolutionizing the wearable devices industry. We specialize in creating innovative and highly functional wearables focused on monitoring health and wellness on a daily basis. At Doori, we aim to empower individuals to take control of their health through our cutting\\-edge technology. Join our team to contribute to the future of health\\-focused wearable innovations.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site role for a Flutter Developer Intern, located in Mumbai. As a Flutter Developer Intern, your responsibilities will include developing and implementing features for mobile applications using the Flutter framework. You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to design and deliver efficient and user\\-friendly applications, write clean and maintainable code, and troubleshoot and debug software. Additionally, you will contribute to improving application performance and ensuring seamless user experiences.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Strong foundation in Computer Science, Programming, and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP).
* Knowledge of Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development principles.

title: Embedded V&V Unit Tester (VectorCAST)
description:
* Develop and execute unit test cases for embedded software applications in C/C\\+\\+ using VectorCAST.
* Validate software functionality on microcontrollers and microprocessors in QNX, SafeRTOS, and Linux environments, ensuring compliance with railway safety standards.
* Create and maintain test scripts, test harnesses, and test environments to ensure comprehensive code coverage (e.g., MC/DC for safety\\-critical applications).
* Utilize IBM CLM tools (Rational DOORS, RTC, RQM) for test requirements management, defect tracking, and reporting, ensuring traceability to safety requirements.
* Collaborate with embedded software developers and hardware teams to identify and resolve defects early in the railway development cycle.
* Perform regression testing, integration testing, and verification of fixes to ensure software reliability and compliance with railway safety standards.
* Document test plans, test procedures, and test results, ensuring traceability to requirements and compliance with functional safety standards.
* Participate in code reviews, Agile development processes, and continuous improvement of testing methodologies.
* Ensure compliance with railway industry standards (e.g., EN 50128, RDSO guidelines, MISRA) and cybersecurity practices for embedded systems testing.

title: Sr PowerApps Developer

 Experience Required: 6\\+ Years

The ideal candidate should have hands\\-on experience with Power Apps (Canvas \\& Model\\-driven), Power Automate, and integrating applications with various data sources.

* Maintain documentation, best practices, and version control of applications.
* Ensure security, role\\-based access, and compliance across all applications.



  





 Required Skills \\& Qualifications:
 



  




* 5\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in Microsoft PowerApps \\& Power Platform.

* Strong understanding of Dataverse, SharePoint Online, Power BI (basic), and SQL.
* Knowledge of Power Fx formulas, JSON, REST APIs, and custom connectors.
* Experience in integrating with Microsoft 365 tools.
* Strong problem\\-solving, analytical, and debugging skills.
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects.



  





 Good to Have:
 



  




* Experience with Power BI dashboards, Azure services, or Dynamics 365\\.
* Certifications in Microsoft Power Platform.

title: Manager, ServiceNow Developer - P&SC
description:
**Job Description**
**The Opportunity**
 The ServiceNow Developer will contribute to building and enhancing solutions on the ServiceNow Platform to support essential services that improve workplace experiences.
   

  

 The person will work with stakeholders across HR, Finance, IT, Legal, Procurement, and Security, providing opportunities to deliver impactful solutions that make work easier and more efficient.
   

  

 Our Technology Centers focus on creating a space where teams can come together to deliver business solutions that save and improve lives. An integral part of our company‚Äôs IT operating model, Tech Centers are globally distributed locations where each IT division has employees to enable our digital transformation journey and drive business outcomes. These locations, in addition to the other sites, are essential to supporting our business and strategy.
   

  

 A focused group of leaders in each Tech Center helps to ensure we can manage and improve each location, from investing in growth, success, and well\\-being of our people, to making sure colleagues from each IT division feel a sense of belonging to managing critical emergencies. And together, we must leverage the strength of our team to collaborate globally to optimize connections and share best practices across the Tech Centers.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 We are seeking a skilled and experienced ServiceNow Developer to join our dynamic ServiceNow team in Corporate Systems. The ideal candidate should possess a strong technical background in ServiceNow development.
   

  

 The role will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to analyze requirements, design solutions, and implement enhancements to our ServiceNow instances, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems and business processes.
   

  

**This position is based in our Hyderabad location and we follow a hybrid work policy.**
**What Will You Do In This Role**
* 2 ‚Äì 5 years of hands\\-on experience with the ServiceNow platform, including modules such as HAM, CMDB, ITSM, ITOM Discovery, Catalog.
* Experience with implementing and managing integrations, Service\\-Graph connectors, basic automation, custom scope application and ServiceNow mobile applications are added advantage.
* Certified System Administrator for ServiceNow.
* Certified Application Developer for ServiceNow.
* Familiarity with API integration, and web service calls.
* Understanding of ETL mapping, transformation maps, and IRE rules
* Experience in Agile development methodologies.


**What Should You Have**
* User Needs Assessment
* Understand user requirements and assist in evaluating ServiceNow capabilities that meet those needs.
* Participate in estimation and refinement of user stories.
* Project \\& Release Management
* Support implementation of release strategies for ServiceNow enhancements.
* Assist in defining scope for small to medium projects.
* Technical Communication
* Share technical updates with team members and stakeholders.
* Help gather business and functional requirements.
* Workflow and Documentations
* Prepare clear documentation for development and deployment processes.
* Maintain records of configurations and changes.
* Technical Solution Development
* Translate functional requirements into technical tasks.
* Perform feasibility checks and basic risk assessments.
* System Configuration and Testing
* Collaborate with systems architects to build, configure and test ServiceNow components.
* Install, configure, and test tools as per design specifications.
* Support integration testing and validation.
* Integration and Maintenance
* Assist in integrating ServiceNow with external systems like Workday or Ariba.
* Help implement testing and validation procedures.
* Documentation and Training
* Document changes and impacts on existing environments.
* Contribute to training materials for end\\-users.


**Who We Are**
 We are known as Merck \\& Co., Inc., Rahway, New Jersey, USA in the United States and Canada and MSD everywhere else. For more than a century, we have been inventing for life, bringing forward medicines and vaccines for many of the world's most challenging diseases. Today, our company continues to be at the forefront of research to deliver innovative health solutions and advance the prevention and treatment of diseases that threaten people and animals around the world.
   

  

**What We Look For**
 Imagine getting up in the morning for a job as important as helping to save and improve lives around the world. Here, you have that opportunity. You can put your empathy, creativity, digital mastery, or scientific genius to work in collaboration with a diverse group of colleagues who pursue and bring hope to countless people who are battling some of the most challenging diseases of our time. Our team is constantly evolving, so if you are among the intellectually curious, join us‚Äîand start making your impact today.
   

  

 \\#HYDIT2025
   

  

**Required Skills**
 Data Engineering, Data Visualization, Design Applications, Software Configurations, Software Development, Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), Solution Architecture, System Designs, System Integration, Testing
   

  

**Preferred Skills**
 Current Employees apply HERE
   

  

 Current Contingent Workers apply HERE
   

  

**Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully**
 Merck \\& Co., Inc., Rahway, NJ, USA, also known as Merck Sharp \\& Dohme LLC, Rahway, NJ, USA, does not accept unsolicited assistance from search firms for employment opportunities. All CVs / resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at our company without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of our company. No fee will be paid in the event a candidate is hired by our company as a result of an agency referral where no pre\\-existing agreement is in place. Where agency agreements are in place, introductions are position specific. Please, no phone calls or emails.
   

  

**Employee Status**
 Regular
   

  

**Relocation**
**VISA Sponsorship**
**Travel Requirements**
**Flexible Work Arrangements**
 Hybrid
   

  

**Shift**
**Valid Driving License**
**Hazardous Material(s)**
**Job Posting End Date**
 12/19/2025
   

  

* A job posting is effective until 11 59 59PM on the day BEFORE the listed job posting end date. Please ensure you apply to a job posting no later than the day BEFORE the job posting end date.

title: Senior Manager, ServiceNow Senior Developer - P&SC
description:
**Job Description**
**The Opportunity**
* The Senior ServiceNow Developer will lead the design, development, and optimisation of solutions on the ServiceNow Platform to deliver seamless and efficient workplace experiences.
* This role involves partnering with stakeholders across HR, Finance, IT, Legal, Procurement, and Security to deliver strategic, scalable solutions that enhance business processes and user experience.


 Our Technology Centers focus on creating a space where teams can come together to deliver business solutions that save and improve lives. An integral part of our company‚Äôs IT operating model, Tech Centers are globally distributed locations where each IT division has employees to enable our digital transformation journey and drive business outcomes. These locations, in addition to the other sites, are essential to supporting our business and strategy.
   

  

 A focused group of leaders in each Tech Center helps to ensure we can manage and improve each location, from investing in growth, success, and well\\-being of our people, to making sure colleagues from each IT division feel a sense of belonging to managing critical emergencies. And together, we must leverage the strength of our team to collaborate globally to optimize connections and share best practices across the Tech Centers.
   

  

****Role Overview****
 We are seeking a skilled and experienced ServiceNow Developer to join our dynamic ServiceNow team in Corporate Systems. The ideal candidate should possess a strong technical background in ServiceNow development.
   

  

 The role will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to analyze requirements, design solutions, and implement enhancements to our ServiceNow instances, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems and business processes.
   

  

**This position is based in our Hyderabad location, and we follow a hybrid work policy.**
****What Will You Do In This Role****
* 5\\+ years of hands\\-on experience with ServiceNow, including work in modules such as HAM, CMDB, ITSM, ITOM Discovery, and Service Catalog.
* Proven experience in designing and implementing integrations, Service Graph connectors, automation workflows, and custom scoped applications.
* Experience in OTM, SAM with exposure to ServiceNow mobile applications and performance optimisation is highly desirable.


****Required Skills****
* Strong verbal and written communication skills with the ability to articulate technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Proficient in JavaScript and familiarity with Python for automation tasks and good advance working knowledge in API integration, REST/SOAP web services, and data exchange mechanisms.
* ServiceNow Certified System Administrator
* Certified Application Developer.
* Configuration Management Database (CMDB) Fundamentals
* At least a ServiceNow Certified Implementation Specialist in ITSM, CSM or Discovery.


****Preferred Skills****
* Deep understanding of ETL mapping, transformation maps, and Identification \\& Reconciliation Engine (IRE) rules.
* Experience in Agile methodologies and leading development sprints.


****What Should You Have****
* Solution Architecture \\& Design
* Lead technical design sessions and define scalable architecture for ServiceNow solutions.
* Translate complex business requirements into robust technical designs.
* Research and evaluate available ServiceNow technologies that align with customer specifications.
* Development \\& Customisation
* Build, configure, and optimise ServiceNow applications and workflows.
* Develop custom applications and advanced automation scripts to meet unique business needs.
* Technical Communication
* Present technical solutions and architectural decisions to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Facilitate cross\\-functional collaboration to gather and validate business and functional requirements in line with governance standards.
* Release \\& Project Management
* Define and manage project scope, objectives, and deliverables for complex ServiceNow initiatives.
* Provide technical leadership for small to large\\-scale projects, ensuring timely delivery and quality standards.
* Governance \\& Documentation
* Maintain comprehensive documentation for configurations, customisations, and integrations.
* Establish best practices for development, testing, and deployment processes.
* Testing \\& Quality Assurance
* Collaborate with enterprise architects to design and implement robust ServiceNow solutions.
* Oversee configuration, installation, and testing of components, ensuring compliance with design specifications.
* Mentorship \\& Collaboration
* Guide junior developers and share best practices across the team.
* Collaborate with architects, business analysts, and stakeholders to align technical solutions with business objectives.
* Integration and Maintenance
* Define and implement rigorous testing and validation procedures for all integrations and enhancements
* Monitor platform performance and recommend optimisation strategies.
* Stay updated on ServiceNow releases and emerging technologies to introduce innovative solutions.


****Who We Are****
 We are known as Merck \\& Co., Inc., Rahway, New Jersey, USA in the United States and Canada and MSD everywhere else. title: Senior Manager, ServiceNow Senior Developer - Operational Technology
description:
**Job Description**
**The Opportunity**
* The Senior ServiceNow Developer will lead the design, development, and optimisation of solutions on the ServiceNow Platform to deliver seamless and efficient workplace experiences.
* This role involves partnering with stakeholders across HR, Finance, IT, Legal, Procurement, and Security to deliver strategic, scalable solutions that enhance business processes and user experience.


 Our Technology Centers focus on creating a space where teams can come together to deliver business solutions that save and improve lives. An integral part of our company‚Äôs IT operating model, Tech Centers are globally distributed locations where each IT division has employees to enable our digital transformation journey and drive business outcomes. These locations, in addition to the other sites, are essential to supporting our business and strategy.
   

  

 A focused group of leaders in each Tech Center helps to ensure we can manage and improve each location, from investing in growth, success, and well\\-being of our people, to making sure colleagues from each IT division feel a sense of belonging to managing critical emergencies. And together, we must leverage the strength of our team to collaborate globally to optimize connections and share best practices across the Tech Centers.
   

  

****Role Overview****
 We are seeking a skilled and experienced ServiceNow Developer to join our dynamic ServiceNow team in Corporate Systems. The ideal candidate should possess a strong technical background in ServiceNow development.
   

  

 The role will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to analyze requirements, design solutions, and implement enhancements to our ServiceNow instances, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems and business processes.
   

  

**This position is based in our Hyderabad location, and we follow a hybrid work policy.**
****What Will You Do In This Role****
* 5\\+ years of hands\\-on experience with ServiceNow, including work in modules such as HAM, CMDB, ITSM, ITOM Discovery, and Service Catalog.
* Proven experience in designing and implementing integrations, Service Graph connectors, automation workflows, and custom scoped applications.
* Experience in OTM, SAM with exposure to ServiceNow mobile applications and performance optimisation is highly desirable.


****Required Skills****
* Strong verbal and written communication skills with the ability to articulate technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Proficient in JavaScript and familiarity with Python for automation tasks and good advance working knowledge in API integration, REST/SOAP web services, and data exchange mechanisms.
* ServiceNow Certified System Administrator
* Certified Application Developer.
* Configuration Management Database (CMDB) Fundamentals
* At least a ServiceNow Certified Implementation Specialist in ITSM, CSM or Discovery.


****Preferred Skills****
* Deep understanding of ETL mapping, transformation maps, and Identification \\& Reconciliation Engine (IRE) rules.
* Experience in Agile methodologies and leading development sprints.


****What Should You Have****
* Solution Architecture \\& Design
* Lead technical design sessions and define scalable architecture for ServiceNow solutions.
* Translate complex business requirements into robust technical designs.
* Research and evaluate available ServiceNow technologies that align with customer specifications.
* Development \\& Customisation
* Build, configure, and optimise ServiceNow applications and workflows.
* Develop custom applications and advanced automation scripts to meet unique business needs.
* Technical Communication
* Present technical solutions and architectural decisions to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Facilitate cross\\-functional collaboration to gather and validate business and functional requirements in line with governance standards.
* Release \\& Project Management
* Define and manage project scope, objectives, and deliverables for complex ServiceNow initiatives.
* Provide technical leadership for small to large\\-scale projects, ensuring timely delivery and quality standards.
* Governance \\& Documentation
* Maintain comprehensive documentation for configurations, customisations, and integrations.
* Establish best practices for development, testing, and deployment processes.
* Testing \\& Quality Assurance
* Collaborate with enterprise architects to design and implement robust ServiceNow solutions.
* Oversee configuration, installation, and testing of components, ensuring compliance with design specifications.
* Mentorship \\& Collaboration
* Guide junior developers and share best practices across the team.
* Collaborate with architects, business analysts, and stakeholders to align technical solutions with business objectives.
* Integration and Maintenance
* Define and implement rigorous testing and validation procedures for all integrations and enhancements
* Monitor platform performance and recommend optimisation strategies.
* Stay updated on ServiceNow releases and emerging technologies to introduce innovative solutions.
